title: 이달의소녀탐구 #335 (LOONA TV #335)
summary:
[These subs are my own rookie translations as BBC didn't upload them online yet. Excuse
my mistakes.]
0:02 -- Olivia Hye has to shoot on the rooftop amidst cold weather. She drinks
medicine and starts shooting again.
0:18 -- Olivia rolls on the floor. (It seems really difficult and what is worse
is that it isn't even in the MV).
0:22 -- The shoot continues till late. HeeJin: "I am not laughing" despite what
face displays. She whines and squirms in the wind. The MV shoot ends.
0:32 -- HeeHye: "Finally! It is done~!! It was a great time despite the extreme
conditions!" They proceed to thank everyone for their hard work.
Olivia Hye Solo Era ends!
(Realized all solo eras are over 😭)
